document_data.name: Ulegar
document_data.deathnotes: Died in the storm that destroyed the ''[[Vigilant (ship)|Vigilant]]''.
document_data.mainbody: '''Ulegar''' was an [[Uthgardt]] sailor aboard the ''[[Vigilant (ship)|Vigilant]]'', a ship that traveled between the [[Sword Coast]] and the [[Chultan Peninsula]] ''circa'' [[1374 DR]].
document_data.Description: Ulegar was a gruff middle-aged [[human]] male. His neck and backs of his hands were decorated with tribal [[tattoo]]s. During the ship's voyage, the tattoos' origins often sparked interest.
document_data.Personality: The Uthgardt man disliked docking in [[Samarach]], calling the city of [[Samargol]] a den of cowards.
document_data.History:
In the {{Yearlink|1374}}, Captain [[Lastri Kassireh]] and the ''Vigilant'' sailed from the [[Sword Coast]] to the [[Chult]]an nation of Samarach.  Onboard the ship were several passengers, including [[Volothamp Geddarm]]. The voyage was cursed with bad luck and numerous strange occurrences. Food supplies were mysteriously spoiled, freshwater [[barrel]]s – ruptured, one of the crew – [[Kellen (sailor)|Kellen]] got drunk and drowned, Volo almost got poisoned, new [[rope]]s became frayed.

Ulegar's life ended when the string of strange occurrences culminated in a deadly storm. The ''Vigilant's'' shipwreck was washed ashore not far from the city of [[Samargol]]. Most sailors perished in the storm, while others were captured to be eaten by the [[Batiri]].
